exclusion.criterion: Review of most recent chest x-ray obtained
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: MRI performed at Lancaster General Hospital Lime Street MRI facility
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: MRI scan sequences, field intensity and fields of exposure selected to minimize risk
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Pacemaker technologist or manufacturer clinical representative interrogates pacemaker/ICD before MRI
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Pacemaker/ICD parameters deactivated for duration of MRI
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients not pacemaker dependent have pacemaker/ICD programmed to AAI/VVI/DDI at 40 beats per minute
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has history of CAD, MI, HLD, HTN, ventricular tachycardia, and syncope. He was recently discharged after a negative work-up for syncope which included the implantation of a cardiac monitoring device.
